sect2.title: Dépendances d'installation de Bash
sect2.para: (Dernière vérification effectuée auprès de la version &bash-depversion;.)
sect2.literallayout: Bash: bash, sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib, size Coreutils: basename, cat, chmod, cp, echo, expr, hostname, install, ln, ls, mkdir, mv, rm, sleep, tr, uname, uniq Diffutils: cmp Gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Grep: egrep, grep Gawk: awk Make: make Ncurses: (libraries) Sed: sed Texinfo: install-info
